item.title: [OOZIE-817] Fix the unreasonable definition of the schema to fs action
item.description:
Schema of fs action require the fs operations must follow the sequence of "delete, mkdir, move, chmod".
The limitation is not reasonable, oozie should allow fs operations to be done in any sequence users like to.
item.summary: Fix the unreasonable definition of the schema to fs action

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
